page.title: 14 PLACE NAMES
page.content: We have found out the meaning of our house-names and villages. Many of the villages we come from have been called after people. St.Brides is named after St.Bridget, St.Mellons is named after St. Melonius and Michaelstone after St.Michael. Roads have also been named after people.Nellive Park is named after the builder's wife and Bakers Court is named after Edwin Baker. The Public Houses have interesting names.The Six bells is named after the six bells in the church tower.The Coach and Horses was a travellers resting place and the local hunt met at the Fox and Hounds.
